description: This dataset contains demographic variables gathered from the American Community Survey (ACS) from 2018 to 2022. It includes data related language and population diversity
source: American Community Survey (ACS) - US Census Bureau

variables.name: foreign_born_p
variables.units: Percent out of total geography population

variables.name: no_english_p
variables.description: Population 5 and over who speak English less than 'very well'
variables.units: Percent out of total geography population

notes: GEOIDs correspond to Census tracts for the given year of the dataset. Note that Census tract boundaries have changed after the 2020 decennial census, which may affect geographic consistency over time.
